page.title: 15AN ASIAN SUNDAY
page.content: On Sunday mornings I get up at 8.30 and then I put on my best clothes. Before I go out I have have a cup of tea and some bread.We go to the Guru Nanak Satsang Sikh Temple as a family.When we arrive, we remove our shoes and everyone has to have their heads covered by material.We go into the Temple and pray.Then we put some money into a gold box,sit down on the floor and listen to the men singing holy songs on the stage.Men and boys sit on one side and the women and the girls sit on the other.After about an hour,the reader will say something special from our holy book-The Guru Granth Sahib.We all kneel and put our foreheads to th floor to show respect. We go to have something to eat in another room but the service still goes on. We talk to friends and then go home.
